sent.orig: I'm not interested in whether he has a lot of money.
sent.trans: 引导主语从句、表语从句或同位语从句一般用whether引导。

sent.orig: And whether cognition is correct lies on whether the subjective judgements accord with the impersonal fact.
sent.trans: 对客观事物的认识正确与否，又取决于主观方面的判断是否符合客观方面的实际。

sent.orig: Check the two equipments running whether normally, and the function of interrelated accessory whether normal.
sent.trans: 检查这两个设备工作是否正常，相关附件的功用是否正常。

sent.orig: Quanjia to measure whether the actions in place, whether carried out generous is an important criterion.
sent.trans: 衡量拳架动作是否到位，是否开展大方是一个重要标准。

sent.orig: To see whether the mandatory national standard, whether there are signs China Environmental Certification.
sent.trans: 看是否符合国家强制标准，是否有中国环境标志认证证书。
